title: Typography Lectureship at Reading, UK
content:
Dream job time. Reading Uni are looking for a lecturer in typography and graphic communication to join their eponymous department:   
   
 [http://jobs.guardian.co.uk/browse/education/academic/vacancy-750350.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016030920/http:/jobs.guardian.co.uk/browse/education/academic/vacancy-750350.html)   
   
Ahhh, if only...
author: porky
